channel.title: Client Compile Problem
channel.description:
When i go to Compile my client (TO CHANGE IP) i get this message!
[IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm305/sqeker07/untitled-11.jpg[/img]
Can anyone explain how i can fix this? I'm REALLY new to server stuff i'm working on my own right now and this is in my way.
~Thanks,Sqeker

item.title: Client Compile Problem
item.dc:creator: @sqeker sqeker
item.description:
@sqeker wrote:

Wooo thanks 100% works now enjoy your rep

Read full topic

item.title: Client Compile Problem
item.dc:creator: @Dennissuperm Dennissuperm
item.description:
@Dennissuperm wrote:

try another compiler

or “edit”

and add this

@echo off
@TITLE Compiler
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

save
and retry

Read full topic
